short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply slowed and reverb effects to audio on webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your audio listening experience.
Add customizable audio effects like tempo adjustments and ambient sound to create unique variations of music and audio in your browser. Our lightweight extension lets you modify playback in real-time - no complex software required. Simple controls let you fine-tune the speed and ambiance to your preference, or choose from preset configurations. Works with audio on many popular streaming sites. Note that compatibility may vary by platform. Premium features include custom presets, advanced tuning controls, pitch preservation, and personalized default settings.
